import { Component } from '@angular/core'; //hace la referencia a cada componente @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes-hero', templateUrl: './hero.component.html', styleUrls: ['./hero.component.css'] }) export class HeroComponent { public name: string = 'Cerveza Club'; public name1: string = 'Cerverza Pilsener'; public name2: string = 'Cerveza Artesanal'; public name3: string = 'Cerverza Alemana'; public age: number = 45; get capitalizeName(): string{ return this.name.toUpperCase(); ///metodo string de JavaScript } public getHeroDescription(): string { this.getHeroDescription return `${this.name} - ${this.age}`; } changeHero():void{ this.name = 'Cervez Club Pemium' } changeAge() { this.age = 25; } }
